location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Samuel Manesty, Resident, Bussora [Basra], to Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun, Native Resident, Bushire

mods.abstract: In this letter, received 26 January 1803, Samuel Manesty, Resident at Bussora [Basra], acknowledges the receipt of letters from Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun [Mirza Mahdi 'Ali Khan Bahadur], Native Resident at Bushire, dated 15 and 26 December 1802 respectively. Manesty sends an accompanying packet for Lieutenant Charles Pasley and offers his best wishes for Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun's safe passage to the Presidency.
